agent_greeting_admin_headline: What can I help you with?
agent_greeting_admin_sub: Manage requests, categories, teams, or get insights about your organisation.
agent_greeting_legal_sub: Review documents, analyse clauses, or research legal questions.
agent_greeting_member_sub: Ask about your requests, track status, or get general guidance.
agent_disclaimer: SILO Agent can make mistakes. Verify important details independently.

doc_choose_template: Choose a document template to get started
doc_auto_save: Docs auto-save here as you create them
doc_clear_confirm: Clear all archived documents? This cannot be undone.
doc_instructions_placeholder: e.g. "This is for a SaaS product. Include GDPR clause and use formal UK English."
doc_ready_custom: Ready — {name} will open a blank editor
doc_select_template: Select a template above to continue
doc_ai_analysing: AI is analysing context and building the document
doc_refinement_placeholder: Ask AI to change anything… e.g. "Add a penalty clause" or "Make it friendlier"
doc_pdf_fallback: PDF generation failed. Downloading markdown instead.
doc_suggestion_expand: Expand the clauses with more detail
